name: firebase
description: Security Rules, Cloud Functions, and more
author: Vertua Inc

scripts._build: npm run build:functions && npm run build:firestore
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:firestore: cd firestore && firestore-rulez && cd .. && npm run _build:firestore:post:mac
scripts._build:firestore:post:mac:
{ printf "rules_version = '2';
" ; cat firestore/firestore.rules ; } > firestore/firestore.rules.tmp && mv firestore/firestore.rules.tmp firestore/firestore.rules
scripts.deploy:staging:functions: npm run build:staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:staging:firestore: npm run build:staging && firebase deploy --only firestore
scripts.deploy:staging:storage: npm run build:staging && firebase deploy --only storage
scripts.deploy:production:functions: npm run build:production && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:production:firestore: npm run build:production && firebase deploy --only firestore
scripts.deploy:production:storage: npm run build:production && firebase deploy --only storage
scripts.emulators: npm run use:staging && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore
scripts.shell: npm run use:staging && cd functions && npm run build && firebase functions:shell
